Package com.filefixer

Class ProcessFiles

java.lang.Object
com.filefixer.ProcessFiles
public class ProcessFiles
extends java.lang.Object
This class contains all methods related to the processing of the files to be fixed

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    ProcessFiles​(java.lang.String origPath, java.lang.String newPath)
    Class constructor accepts the file paths(origin and destination) for the files to be processed

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void appendDataFilesList()
    This class adds all of the data files from the folder to an arrayList for easy traversing
    void exportListOfMissingFiles()
    This method exports the generated list of missing submission files.
    void extractDataFromCSV()
    This class extracts all of the student data stored in the CSV data file
    java.lang.String generateListOfMissingFiles()
    This method generates a list of missing submission files, accounted for in the CSV data file, and stores the list in a string variable
    java.io.File getCSVFeedbackFile()
    getCSVFeedbackFile() gets the file object that was created for the csvFeedbackFile file
    java.lang.String getFileExtension​(java.io.File file)
    getFileExtension() the extension of a file object that is passed via parameter
    java.io.File getFilesToRename()
    getFilesToRename() gets the file object that was created for the fileToRename folder
    boolean getFoldersExistance()
    getFoldersExistance() gets the boolean value of the foldersExistance variable.
    java.io.File getRenamedFiles()
    getRenamedFiles() gets the file object that was created for the renamedFiles folder
    java.lang.String renameFile​(java.io.File file, Student student)
    This method renames a single file, supplied via parameter, to the filename required by myElearning.
    void renameFiles()
    This method renames all files store in the dataFiles arrayList

  • Constructor Details

    • ProcessFiles

      public ProcessFiles​(java.lang.String origPath, java.lang.String newPath)
      Class constructor accepts the file paths(origin and destination) for the files to be processed
      Parameters:
      origPath - This is the path to the source folder where all of the PDF files are located
      newPath - This is the path to where the corrected files will be stored

  • Method Details

    • extractDataFromCSV

      public void extractDataFromCSV()
      This class extracts all of the student data stored in the CSV data file

    • appendDataFilesList

      public void appendDataFilesList()
      This class adds all of the data files from the folder to an arrayList for easy traversing

    • renameFile

      public java.lang.String renameFile​(java.io.File file, Student student)
      This method renames a single file, supplied via parameter, to the filename required by myElearning. Since renameTo() returns a bool, it also checks to make sure that each file as been renamed sucessfully.
      Parameters:
      file - This is a file object for the current file that is being processed
      student - This is a student object for the student whose information we're currently processing
      Returns:
      filename of the file that we just renamed

    • renameFiles

      public void renameFiles()
      This method renames all files store in the dataFiles arrayList

    • generateListOfMissingFiles

      public java.lang.String generateListOfMissingFiles()
      This method generates a list of missing submission files, accounted for in the CSV data file, and stores the list in a string variable
      Returns:
      The list of students with missing submission files

    • exportListOfMissingFiles

      public void exportListOfMissingFiles()
      This method exports the generated list of missing submission files. The list is written to a file in the missingFilesList folder.

    • getFileExtension

      public java.lang.String getFileExtension​(java.io.File file)
      getFileExtension() the extension of a file object that is passed via parameter
      Parameters:
      file - This is a file object for the current file that is being processed
      Returns:
      The extension of the file object supplied

    • getFoldersExistance

      public boolean getFoldersExistance()
      getFoldersExistance() gets the boolean value of the foldersExistance variable. This variable is used to track the existance of the various folders created
      Returns:
      foldersExistance

    • getCSVFeedbackFile

      public java.io.File getCSVFeedbackFile()
      getCSVFeedbackFile() gets the file object that was created for the csvFeedbackFile file
      Returns:
      csvFeedbackFile

    • getRenamedFiles

      public java.io.File getRenamedFiles()
      getRenamedFiles() gets the file object that was created for the renamedFiles folder
      Returns:
      renamedFiles

    • getFilesToRename

      public java.io.File getFilesToRename()
      getFilesToRename() gets the file object that was created for the fileToRename folder
      Returns:
      filesToRename
